City Leader Guides

City Leader Guide on Equitable Economic Development

LaChaun Banks, Jorrit de Jong, Adam Hawksbee, Angelo Kalaw, Henry McKoy, Dana Niu, and Katie Shultz
August 9, 2021

This guide helps city leaders translate their commitment to economic equity, inclusive growth, and racial justice into action, especially as they lead economic recovery post-COVID-19. The guide offers: a diagnostic tool to assess the organizational readiness of city hall to do the work; a diagnostic tool to assess the current state of their local economy and identify equity gaps; guidance on setting meaningful goals and benchmarks, and developing relevant metrics; an overview of promising practices in equitable economic development from around the country; and guidance on implementing new approaches.

Read more
Download Workbook for City Leader Guide on Equitable Development

City Leader Guides

City Leader Guide on Fiscal Resilience

August 9, 2021

City leaders, faced with converging health and economic crises, have to radically rethink their budgets and make tough decisions. This guide and companion website help city leaders diagnose and address fiscal challenges, access relevant resources, and identify leadership levers in order to move cities out of crisis and towards fiscal resiliency.

Read more
Download City Leader Guide on Fiscal Resilience

What’s a Rich Text element?

The rich text element allows you to create and format headings, paragraphs, blockquotes, images, and video all in one place instead of having to add and format them individually. Just double-click and easily create content.

Static and dynamic content editing

A rich text element can be used with static or dynamic content. For static content, just drop it into any page and begin editing. For dynamic content, add a rich text field to any collection and then connect a rich text element to that field in the settings panel. Voila!

How to customize formatting for each rich text

Headings, paragraphs, blockquotes, figures, images, and figure captions can all be styled after a class is added to the rich text element using the "When inside of" nested selector system.

This is some text inside of a div block.

What’s a Rich Text element?

The rich text element allows you to create and format headings, paragraphs, blockquotes, images, and video all in one place instead of having to add and format them individually. Just double-click and easily create content.

Static and dynamic content editing

A rich text element can be used with static or dynamic content. For static content, just drop it into any page and begin editing. For dynamic content, add a rich text field to any collection and then connect a rich text element to that field in the settings panel. Voila!

How to customize formatting for each rich text

Headings, paragraphs, blockquotes, figures, images, and figure captions can all be styled after a class is added to the rich text element using the "When inside of" nested selector system.

City Leader Guides

City Leader Guide on Equitable Economic Development

This guide helps city leaders translate their commitment to economic equity, inclusive growth, and racial justice into action, especially as they lead economic recovery post-COVID-19. The guide offers: a diagnostic tool to assess the organizational readiness of city hall to do the work; a diagnostic tool to assess the current state of their local economy and identify equity gaps; guidance on setting meaningful goals and benchmarks, and developing relevant metrics; an overview of promising practices in equitable economic development from around the country; and guidance on implementing new approaches.

Download City Leader Guide on Economic Development
Download Workbook for City Leader Guide on Equitable Development
City Leaders, Scholars & Educators
City Leader Guides
multi-reference tags will be 'pasted' here! our text-based list is below
Collaboration, Innovation, Data & Evidence, Engaging Communities

City Leader Guide on Fiscal Resilience

City leaders, faced with converging health and economic crises, have to radically rethink their budgets and make tough decisions. This guide and companion website help city leaders diagnose and address fiscal challenges, access relevant resources, and identify leadership levers in order to move cities out of crisis and towards fiscal resiliency.
